description: A powerful technique where Ivankov winks with such force that it creates a massive shockwave capable of deflecting cannon fire and repelling attacks.

firstUse.context: Ivankov uses Death Wink to deflect a vengeful pirate's cannon shot

limitations: Requires precise timing and eye coordination

description: Special hormones that stimulate the immune system to fight deadly diseases and poisons. The treatment requires the patient to have extraordinary willpower and takes years off their lifespan as payment for the energy used.

firstUse.context: Ivankov begins treating Luffy's poison from Magellan

limitations: Takes 10 years off the patient's lifespan, causes extreme pain, requires over 2 days to complete, only works on those with extraordinary willpower
significance: One of the most powerful medical techniques in One Piece, capable of curing otherwise fatal conditions at great cost

description: Hormones that can instantly change a person's biological sex by altering their body's hormone balance.

firstUse.context: Ivankov transforms a vengeful pirate into a woman

significance: Demonstrates the unique and versatile nature of the Horu Horu no Mi Devil Fruit
